Class THWidget

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      THWidget

public class THWidget
extends greenfoot.Actor

THWidget is a health bar that displays the current amount of health. The bar increases and decreases in size depending on whether HP is increasing or decreasing. There is also text on the bar that shows the amount of health.

Version:
February 2014
Author:
Terrence Hung

Constructor Summary
THWidget()
          Constructs an HP bar 250px by 50px that starts at 100 HP, with a 5px wide black border and green fill.
THWidget(int bgLength, int hpMax, java.awt.Color bgColor, java.awt.Color fColor)
          Constructs an HP bar with a 5:1 length to height ratio that starts at full HP by drawing two rectangles with the bigger one acting as the border and background.
THWidget(int bgLength, int hpMax, int hpCurrent, java.awt.Color bgColor, java.awt.Color fColor)
          Constructs an HP bar with a 5:1 length to height ratio that starts at a given HP by drawing two rectangles with the bigger one acting as the border and background.
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Changes color of health bar to red if health is less than 15%, yellow if health is less than 40%, or original color if health is above 40%.
 void update(java.awt.Color fColor)
          Changes the color of the HP bar.
 void update(int change)
          Increases or decreases HP and updates the bar accordingly.

addedToWorld, getImage, getIntersectingObjects, getNeighbours, getObjectsAtOffset, getObjectsInRange, getOneIntersectingObject, getOneObjectAtOffset, getRotation, getWorld, getX, getY, intersects, isTouching, move, removeTouching, setImage, setImage, setLocation, setRotation, turn, turnTowards

Constructor Detail

THWidget

public THWidget()
Constructs an HP bar 250px by 50px that starts at 100 HP, with a 5px wide black border and green fill.

THWidget

public THWidget(int bgLength,
                int hpMax,
                java.awt.Color bgColor,
                java.awt.Color fColor)
Constructs an HP bar with a 5:1 length to height ratio that starts at full HP by drawing two rectangles with the bigger one acting as the border and background.

Parameters:
bgLength - Length of the entire bar in pixels
hpMax - Maximum amount of HP that the bar can have
bgColor - Color of the back rectangle
fColor - Color of the bar that will be inside the border

THWidget

public THWidget(int bgLength,
                int hpMax,
                int hpCurrent,
                java.awt.Color bgColor,
                java.awt.Color fColor)
Constructs an HP bar with a 5:1 length to height ratio that starts at a given HP by drawing two rectangles with the bigger one acting as the border and background.

Parameters:
bgLength - Length of the entire bar in pixels
hpMax - Maximum amount of HP that the bar can have
hpCurrent - Current amount of HP the bar has
bgColor - Color of the back rectangle
fColor - Color of the bar that will be inside the border
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Changes color of health bar to red if health is less than 15%, yellow if health is less than 40%, or original color if health is above 40%.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

update

public void update(java.awt.Color fColor)
Changes the color of the HP bar.

Parameters:
fColor - New color of HP bar

update

public void update(int change)
Increases or decreases HP and updates the bar accordingly.

Parameters:
change - How much the health changes by
